formalpara.title: if you are using bash — run even simply

para.programlisting:
wget https://github.com/daggerok/streaming-file-server/releases/download/4.3.30/file-items-service-4.3.30.jar bash file-items-service-4.3.30.jar
wget https://github.com/daggerok/streaming-file-server/releases/download/4.3.30/file-server-4.3.30.jar bash file-server-4.3.30.jar --app.upload.path=./path/to/file-storage
